text:
Siddharth Does It Again, Takes A Hilarious Jibe At Akshay Kumar For The PM Modi Interview
Siddharth Does It Again, Takes A Hilarious Jibe At Akshay Kumar For The PM Modi Interview
Akshay Kumar announced it to his fans that he is all set to venture into an unknown and uncharted territory with something he had not done before. He announced the news of having a "candid and completely non- political" chat with Modi on Wednesday.
He added that his conversation with the prime minister will be also a breather in election time. The interview took place in New Delhi today and was telecasted by news agency ANI.
Twitter
In the interview, PM Modi gave insights into his personality, his political friendships and much more. While the interview is being dissected by people all over India, there is one person who had the most subtle judgement to pass.
Twitter
Don't Miss 814 SHARES 1.2 K SHARES 9.8 K SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.4 K SHARES
In his tweet, Rang De Basanti actor Siddharth wrote, "#Akshaykumar is very underrated as a villain." and it isn't a tough nut to crack that it's a jibe at Akshay Kumar!
#akshaykumar is very underrated as a villain. — Siddharth (@Actor_Siddharth) April 24, 2019
The tweet has over 1,517 Retweets 8,791 Likes, proving that a lot of people got the point that he was trying to make. And in no time, fans had a lot to say after his tweet. Check out some of the tweets:
You are underrated as a Comedian. — Prasath (@imprasath) April 24, 2019
Hilarious — Madan sharma (@Mannsharma090) April 24, 2019
he is very underrated as canadian — ysh paul (@paul_ysh) April 24, 2019
he is very underrated as canadian — ysh paul (@paul_ysh) April 24, 2019
